name: OrionStar Robotics
description: Beijing-based robotics company building AI-powered service, logistics, and autonomous driving robots for retail and warehouse applications.

name: Clevon
description: Developer and manufacturer of lightweight autonomous delivery robots and ADS/teleoperation systems for last-mile logistics.

name: DF Automation & Robotics
description: Malaysian firm designing, manufacturing and maintaining Autonomous Mobile Robots (AMRs) and AGVs for industrial and commercial use.

name: Starship Technologies
description: Developer and operator of small autonomous sidewalk delivery robots for last-mile food and package delivery.

name: Robonnement
description: Robotics-as-a-service startup offering monthly robot subscriptions for manufacturing automation and flexible deployments.

name: Doosan Robotics
description: Producer of collaborative robots (cobots) and robotic solutions for manufacturing and industrial automation.

name: All3
description: Construction robotics and software company developing automation solutions for building and on-site tasks.

name: MetraLabs GmbH
description: German mobile robotics company specializing in autonomous mobile robots and interactive service robots for industry and research.

name: dConstruct Robotics
description: Singapore-based startup focused on autonomy, sensors, vision/ML and AMR/humanoid robotics development.

name: IADYS
description: Developer of marine and environmental robots (e.g., Jellyfishbot) for water preservation and oil-spill response.

name: ANYbotics
description: Swiss company building quadrupedal ANYmal robots for autonomous industrial inspection and remote operations.

name: Naïo Technologies
description: French agricultural robotics company producing electric autonomous robots for tasks like weeding, sowing and hoeing.

name: Autonomous Pivot
description: Converts center-pivot irrigation systems into autonomous platforms for irrigation, fertigation and automated crop protection.

name: Agora Robotics
description: Builders of an autonomous service-robotics ecosystem for cleaning, intralogistics, inventory scanning and digital-twin applications.

name: Darkhive
description: Provider of open autonomous robotics systems targeted at defense and public-safety applications.

name: LexxPluss
description: Supplier of hybrid autonomous mobile robots and system integration services for industrial and logistics automation.

name: PhiGent Robotics
description: Company offering autonomous driving solutions and 3D/AI perception technologies for autonomous vehicles and robots.

name: Renu Robotics
description: Develops autonomous electric vehicles with mission-control monitoring under a software subscription model.

name: FERNRIDE
description: Autonomous trucking platform focused on electric, autonomous yard and regional trucking solutions.

name: Carbon Robotics
description: Develops autonomous field robots for agriculture, including autonomous weed-management systems.

name: AeroVect
description: Builds airport automation systems using embodied AI to manage airfield baggage and cargo logistics.

name: Indoor Robotics
description: Developer of fully autonomous indoor drone fleets and AI solutions for security and monitoring in smart buildings.

name: Ulysses Ecosystem Engineering
description: Uses autonomous robots to plant seagrass seeds on the ocean floor for large-scale marine habitat restoration.

name: Gitai
description: Japanese space-robotics company developing autonomous robotic arms and systems for in-orbit servicing and ISS demonstrations.

name: Brain Corp.
description: Develops BrainOS navigation platform and autonomous systems for in-store and warehouse delivery and robotics applications.

name: Serve Robotics
description: Spun out from Postmates; operates sidewalk delivery robot fleets for food and last-mile logistics with enterprise partners.

name: Cartken
description: Builds autonomous delivery and indoor/outdoor AMRs for campuses, manufacturing sites and last-mile logistics.

name: Coco Robotics
description: Manufacturer and operator of the Coco sidewalk delivery vehicle used in urban food-delivery pilots and integrations.

name: Avride
description: Autonomous-vehicle and delivery-robot startup spun out of Yandex's self-driving group, operating sidewalk robots and supervised autonomy.

name: Built Robotics
description: Produces autonomy retrofit kits and software that convert heavy construction equipment into fully autonomous machines.

name: Agility Robotics
description: Humanoid robotics company creating Digit and bipedal robotic solutions for warehousing, logistics and automation.

name: Clearpath Robotics (OTTO Motors)
description: Manufacturer of research UGVs and industrial autonomous vehicles, including the OTTO Motors fleet for material handling.

name: Boost Robotics
description: YC-listed startup building autonomous mobile manipulation robots for remote manual tasks and industrial applications.

name: Skydio
description: US autonomous drone company producing AI-first drones for inspection, public safety and enterprise BVLOS operations.

name: Locus Robotics
description: Warehouse-focused AMR provider offering collaborative pick-assist robots and an orchestration platform (RaaS and CapEx models).

name: Mobile Industrial Robots (MiR)
description: Denmark-based AMR maker supplying flexible modular robots for internal transport, pallet handling and fleet management.

name: Geek+
description: Global AMR and intralogistics company offering tote-to-person, shelf-to-person and sorting systems for warehouses.

name: inVia Robotics
description: Warehouse automation company offering goods-to-person AMRs, orchestration software and Robotics-as-a-Service for fulfillment centers.

name: Brightpick
description: AI-powered warehouse robotics company offering multi-purpose mobile manipulators and RaaS for order picking and replenishment.

name: AGILOX
description: Austrian AMR maker delivering omnidirectional robots and X-SWARM fleet technology for pallet, box and conveyor interactions.

name: Fetch Robotics
description: Developer of cloud-connected AMRs for material handling and pick-assist workflows (now part of broader automation portfolios).

name: Vecna Robotics
description: Provider of automated material handling solutions including autonomous pallet trucks, forklifts and tote retrieval AMRs.

name: 6 River Systems
description: Provider of collaborative goods-to-person AMRs (Chuck) and fulfillment software for warehouse operations.

name: Percepto
description: Autonomous drone-in-a-box provider with AIM platform for automated industrial inspections and continuous monitoring.

name: Taurob GmbH
description: Austrian company making ATEX-certified autonomous mobile inspection robots for oil & gas and hazardous industrial sites.

name: Flyability
description: Swiss firm building collision-tolerant drones (Elios) for confined-space and hazardous-environment inspections.

name: Robotnik Automation S.L.L.
description: Spanish developer of autonomous mobile robots and mobile manipulators for inspection, logistics and agricultural applications.

name: Inspector Bots
description: US maker of rugged, portable inspection robots (Minibot, Trackbot, PTM) for crawlspaces, under-vehicle and confined inspections.

name: BDX Robotics
description: Provider of robotic roof and building inspection systems combining scanning, mapping and AI analytics for commercial inspections.

name: FarmWise Labs, Inc.
description: Ag-tech robotics firm building autonomous weeding and precision-cultivation machines and offering Robot-as-a-Service.

name: FarmBot, Inc.
description: Open-source precision agriculture CNC farming project and company providing FarmBot hardware kits and automation software.

name: Bonsai Robotics
description: Ag-tech startup building vision-based autonomy (VisionSteer) for orchard equipment and off-road farm vehicles.

name: Agrobot
description: Spanish ag-robotics company developing robotic harvesters and precision-ag machinery for soft fruit and specialty crops.

name: Traptic
description: Developer of strawberry-picking robots and computer-vision harvesting systems for specialty-crop automation.

name: Tortuga AgTech
description: Denver-based ag-tech company focused on robotic harvesting and automation for soft produce with RaaS offerings.

name: Octinion
description: Belgian R&D company developing mechatronic solutions and the Rubion strawberry-picking robot and horticulture platforms.

name: Harvest CROO Robotics
description: Developer of autonomous strawberry pickers and pick-to-pack harvesting solutions for growers.

name: Small Robot Company
description: UK agritech developer of per-plant robots for precision farming (company reported to have entered liquidation in 2024).

name: Solinftec
description: Brazilian ag-tech provider of farm management systems and autonomous field robotics for large-scale crop operations.
